description: The calm of Cardiff is interrupted as is Chidgey and Jennaâ€™s relationship when and old flame arrives at the door. During a trip back to the Valleys, Liam treats his straight male house mates to the joys of a communal shower at his local rugby club. While the girls find a better use for whipped cream than cake making. On the work front Boss Jordan announces a night to remember and Nicole brings a little S&M to a photo shoot. A night out in town ends in a fall out and a falling into bed, and a game of truth or dare throws up a few surprises and almost a few punches.
